ygData.subject: RE: Selling to Krak?
ygData.msgSnippet: For the longest time I could not figure this out - either.  Sounds like you don t have sneak going successfully.  Yes, you clicked the button, yes it grayed
ygData.messageBody:
For the longest time I could not figure this out - either. Sounds like you
don't have sneak going successfully. Yes, you clicked the button, yes it
grayed out, but probably it's not sneaking. Like sense heading, sneak is a
skill you have to build up. You can tell when you have a successful sneak
going because you will change to walking at half speed. Also, he will sell
to you <g>

So, keep trying by re-starting sneak until you get a good sneak going then
get behind him and sell those rusty weps <g>

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 03, 2000 9:08 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Selling to Krak?

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

Aviak's have no faction so are immune to Carillon. Sounds like they have
have fixed the sneak/sell bug. Where you behind him when you tried to sell?

Rokenn


>From: "J L Smith" <slider@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Selling to Krak?
>Date: Thu, 3 Feb 2000 09:01:56 -0600
>
>Last night I tried to sell to Krak, the vendor at the top of the Aviak
>village in SK. I conned dubious at first and he told me nicely where the
>exit was. Carillon, with flute or without, would not raise my faction above
>dubious, and did not change his response. With sneak I got him to
>indifferent, but he still wouldn't sell. His response was different,
>though,
>saying that he doesn't talk to Half-Elves, much less sell to them.
>
